term.title: anticholinergic

item.text: (adjective) Preventing transmission of parasympathetic nerve impulses.
(noun) Substance which prevents transmission of parasympathetic nerve impulses.

term.sources: 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' Duffus, J.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1993 65(9) 2003
term.citation: Citation: 'anticholinergic' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.A00385

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
